ygData.subject: Re: Good places for hunting for 18th level
ygData.msgSnippet: Try Gargoyle Isle in OOT there are greater Skellys there, most of the ppl that hunt there are looking for Gargs so clearing the skellys is a waste of mana for
ygData.messageBody:
Try Gargoyle Isle in OOT there are greater Skellys there, most of the ppl that hunt there are looking for Gargs so clearing the skellys is a waste of mana for them(but ya have to or the gargs will not spawn), Greater skellys are about level 16-18 and drop gold and silver and an occ. weapon. Just watch out for the top of the isle there are 4 specters there.
----- Original Message -----
From: T'n-D'rl
To: eq-clerics@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 8:20 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Good places for hunting for 18th level


From: T'n-D'rl <tndrl@...>

I'm trying to get more out of my online time. I work 2 jobs and can only
go on for a total of maybe 4 hours a week. Any suggestions to maximize
my xp at 18th level? I'd like to try to solo mostly, as I usually end up
leaving the group abruptly and that's not fair to them. Any help would
be appreciated.

Qanadar, Cleric of Tunare, Karana
--
tndrl@...
